textBeforeTable: Lay seasoned strips on smoke screens and place in smokehouse. Cooking Instructions: Drag meat slices through seasoning, completely covering all sides. After covering slices with seasoning, put in a bag and add water until covered and hold in the cooler for 12 hours. Or, for a re-structured jerky, mix cure into seasoning and then into meat. Grind meat once through a 1/8" plate and extrude using the All-Around Jerky Maker on your grinder or stuffer. Process: Mix the jerky seasoning and the sure cure together. Mix: 1-bag Excalibur Jerky Seasoning (for 25 lbs. of meat) 1-bag (1 oz.) Sure Cure (cure package is included with all jerky seasonings) Additives: 25 lbs. meat, sliced against the grain, 1/8" to 1/4" thick Meat Block: Jerky (Whole Muscle Or Restructured) Download PDF Dry Rub Bacon Kielbasa
